connect20/syncwithsalesforcecrm.name: connect20/SyncwithSalesforceCrm

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/syncwithsalesforcecrm.description: This extension would post real time leads from magento to salesforce automatically. This extension also has the capability to transfer abandoned shopping carts from Magento to salesforce as opportunities which would allow your sales team to track the opportunity and convert to a sale. We also have a feature where once an opportunity is converted to a sale in salesforce, it can create an order in magento. Please contact us at 302-355-0449 begin_of_the_skype_highlighting              302-355-0449      end_of_the_skype_highlighting for further details or email me directly at info@thylaksoft.com and buyan@talktoaprogrammer.com for further information.
